alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 04 at 7:34AM EST until March 05 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... The Kentucky River near Ravenna, affecting Estill County. ...A FLOOD ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The advisory is for the Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...The advisory runs until Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest and should begin to fall today. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 7 PM.
